Wicked One (1995)

http://www.iafd.com/title.rme/title=Wicked+One/year=1995/wicked-one.htm

Thanks! haven't checked it out yet but it looks to be complete.

This DVD is overdubbed in Russian...

... meaning, an idiot is speaking in Russian over the movie (even the female parts). You can't remove it unless you remove ALL of the audio...

WHY the FUCK do these MORONS do that?

Are they just too fucking STUPID to add another audio track in Russian?
